body_html:
@xkszltl I found a strange problem. With the latest pybind11 from anaconda, both the old code and the new code produce the following messages on my system:

Python 3.6.6 :: Anaconda custom (64-bit)                                                                                                                                                       
-- System pybind11 found                                                                                                                                                                       
-- pybind11l include dirs: /home/hong/anaconda3/include/python3.6m/home/hong/anaconda3/include/python3.6m

In other words, the include directory is repeated twice. I still have no idea why this is happening.

body:
@xkszltl  I found a strange problem. With the latest pybind11 from anaconda, both the old code and the new code produce the following messages on my system:

```
Python 3.6.6 :: Anaconda custom (64-bit)                                                                                                                                                       
-- System pybind11 found                                                                                                                                                                       
-- pybind11l include dirs: /home/hong/anaconda3/include/python3.6m/home/hong/anaconda3/include/python3.6m 
```

In other words, the include directory is repeated twice. I still have no idea why this is happening.
